1651910.name: Project Genesis - Bronze Founders Pack
1651910.description:
BRONZE FOUNDERS PACK

You’re not content with the standard cosmetics; you require a little flair. The Bronze Age is recognized as the first age that humans started to work with metal, so the BRONZE PACK honors you as one of the FIRST Founders within the Project Genesis universe. The BRONZE PACK entitles you to the BRONZE EMBLEM and FOUNDERS PALETTE to outfit your battle craft with the O.G. colors, a Bronze Founder designation in Discord.
Important note: The contents of this Pack are cosmetic only.

Items in the Bronze Founders Pack include:

  • Bronze Founder Emblem
  • Remastered OST (future release)
  • Founders Pack Color Palette

*If you're already an owner of this pack and don't see your items in-game, please re-link Steam to your account profile on and login again into the game to receive your items.
1651910.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
